provisions.title: Section 9
provisions.content:
9.-(1) Any person who proves to ihe satisfaction of the ~etundr.
    Commissioner of Inland Revenue that he has paid to a 12/1985
    Collector travel tax in excess of the amount which he is soh.
    properly required to pay pursuant to this Act shall be
    entitled to have the amount so paid in excess refunded, and
    the Commissioner of Inland Revenue shall make the refund
    accordingly.
            (2) No claim for a refund under this section shall be
    entertained after the expiration of six months from the date
    on which payment of the amount in dispute was made to a
    Collector.
